heading: Inspired by centuries of<br class='hidden-sm-and-up' /> marine wisdom
description: Sailing on a modern-take of the Phinisi is the best way to enjoy the beauty of the Indonesian archipelago. An icon of Indonesia's seafaring tradition, the Phinisi boat-building is recognized by UNESCO as a Masterpiece of Oral and Intangible Heritage of Humanity.

carousel_card.caption: The Decks
carousel_card.heading: The sea is your fairway
carousel_card.text: The shaded lounge areas on the fore and aft decks offer an oasis of calm to relax and bask in the ever-changing scenery. The top deck offers a one-of-a-kind ‘equatorial golf’ experience using biodegradable ecoballs, making the ocean as the player's fairway.

carousel_card.caption: The Decks
carousel_card.heading: Craftmanship lives on
carousel_card.text: The most emblematic of the main deck area, the Gajah Mada lounge and dining room, features a large decorative copper bas-relief depicting iconic maritime scenes from a bygone era.

teams.caption: The Team
teams.heading: The beating heart of our mission

card_text_image.caption: Sustainability
card_text_image.heading: After all, the ocean is our home
card_text_image.text: We have profound responsibility in preserving and protecting the places and communities we visit. More than anything else, we take care of the environment in which we operate, the guests who cruise with us, and the people who work with us.
